title: (x) UPS marketing / Skyline Chili - (similar to) FF Dax / Barmeno/FF Sari {Jared, Yves}
content:
I’m sure this is a no-brainer for most of you, but what font does UPS use in it’s advertising (and logo)? Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ups.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/typophile.com/files/ups.gif) | 23.77 KB |

 [‹ (x) Stuffed Animals - Kenyan Coffee {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13076 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Garcia's Mexican Restaurant - Latin Condensed (stretched), Impact, Amazone Script {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13069 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Peter G.

comments.content:
As I understand it, it’s a suspicious FF Dax derivative created by Futurebrand.

From Futurebrand’s site: “...a comprehensive visual identity system which includes a proprietary typeface...”
Hmm... How about the font used in the tagline on [this site](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/www.skylinechili.com/ "Skyline Chili")? (Great chili, by the way.)

This is [Barmeno](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=BQ90042003P1), which was subsequently expanded into [FF Sari](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=16&displayfontid=FF.11098.0.0&fontRendererText=It+s+Skyline+Time), by the same type designer [Hans Reichel](http://web.archive.org/web/20080505104013/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Hans%252BReichel).
